title: Falsification of Learning-Based Controllers through Multi-Fidelity Bayesian Optimization. (arXiv:2212.14118v4 [eess.SY] UPDATED)
abstract: Simulation-based falsification is a practical testing method to increase confidence that the system will meet safety requirements. Because full-fidelity simulations can be computationally demanding, we investigate the use of simulators with different levels of fidelity. As a first step, we express the overall safety specification in terms of environmental parameters and structure this safety specification as an optimization problem. translated_title: 基于多保真贝叶斯优化的学习控制器虚假检测
translated_abstract: 基于仿真的虚假检测是一种增加系统满足安全要求信心的实用测试方法。因为完全保真度的仿真可能具有计算需求大的特点，我们研究了使用不同保真度水平的模拟器的可行性。首先，我们将整体安全规格化为环境参数，并将该安全规格化为优化问题。我们提出了一种使用贝叶斯优化的多保真度虚假检测框架，该框架可以确定应在哪个保真度级别进行安全评估，同时从可能导致系统失效的环境中找到可能的实例。该方法可以在低保真度模拟器提供低成本不准确信息和高保真度模拟器提供高成本准确信息之间自动切换，实现成本效益最大化。在不同仿真环境的实验中，我们展示了多保真度虚假检测方法的有效性。
tldr: 通过贝叶斯优化在低成本低保真度模拟器和高成本高保真度模拟器之间自动切换，实现学习控制器的虚假检测。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a multi-fidelity falsification framework using Bayesian optimization to switch automatically between low-cost, low-fidelity simulators and high-cost, high-fidelity simulators for learning-based controllers' falsification, making it efficient and cost-effective.
